1.TitleEnglish: The Wolf and the Seven Little Goats
1.SummaryEnglish: Dutch Tale: A mother goat leaves her seven children at home while she ventures into the forest to find food. Before she leaves, she warns her young about the Big Bad Wolf who will try to sneak into the house and gobble them up...

5.SummaryEnglish: Danish Tale: A vain emperor who cares about nothing except wearing and displaying clothes hires weavers who promise him they will make him the best suit of clothes.
